<div class="content">
<header><h3 class="article-name">VOTE: Splatoon 2 will still have hours-long map rotations - is it the right call?</h3>
<p class="byline">
<span class="by-author">
By
<span style="white-space:nowrap">
Connor Sheridan </span>
</span>
<time class="published-date relative-date" datetime="2017-05-08T20:12:33.127Z"></time></p>

<article class="search-result search-result-news optional-image-wrapper has-rating"><div class="image">
<figure class="article-lead-image-wrap" data-original="http://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/9GFwDGYGEdXF3SgdBXXnUC.jpg"><img src="http://static.gamesradar.futurecdn.net/media/img/missing-image.svg" alt="" class=" lazy-image lazy-image-loading lazyload optional-image" onerror="this.parentNode.replaceChild(window.missingImage(),this)" sizes="auto" data-normal="http://static.gamesradar.futurecdn.net/media/img/missing-image.svg" data-src="http://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/9GFwDGYGEdXF3SgdBXXnUC-320-80.jpg" data-srcset="http://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/9GFwDGYGEdXF3SgdBXXnUC-320-80.jpg 320w, http://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/9GFwDGYGEdXF3SgdBXXnUC-450-80.jpg 450w, http://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/9GFwDGYGEdXF3SgdBXXnUC-970-80.jpg 970w" data-sizes="auto" data-original-mos="http://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/9GFwDGYGEdXF3SgdBXXnUC.jpg" data-pin-media="http://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/9GFwDGYGEdXF3SgdBXXnUC.jpg" data-pin-nopin="true"></figure></div>
<div class="content">
<header><h3 class="article-name">Super Mario Kart began life as an F-Zero multiplayer prototype, reveals Retro Gamer interview</h3>
<p class="byline">
<span class="by-author">
By
<span style="white-space:nowrap">
David Houghton </span>
</span>
<time class="published-date relative-date" datetime="2017-04-14T09:53:50.103Z"></time></p>
</header><p class="synopsis"><span class="free-text-label">News </span>
</p>
</div>
</article></a>
<a class="category-link" href="javascript:void(0)">News </a>
<!-- Cats: -->
</div>
<div class="listingResult small result4 " data-page="1">
<a href="http://www.gamesradar.com/golden-joystick-awards-2016-voting-has-closed-heres-how-to-see-if-your-favourite-game-wins-the-ultimate-prize/">
<article class="search-result search-result-news optional-image-wrapper has-rating"><div class="image">

<header><h3 class="article-name">The Humble Bundle for Android now playing</h3>
<p class="byline">
<span class="by-author">
By
<span style="white-space:nowrap">
Matt Bradford </span>
</span>
<time class="published-date relative-date" datetime="2012-02-01T17:37:48.31Z"></time></p>
</header><p class="synopsis">

</div>
</article></a>
<!-- Cats: -->
</div>
</div>
</section></div>
<section class="sidebar" id="sidebar"><section class="box newsletter-signup"><h3 class="separator-heading">
<span>
<i class="icon icon-envelope white"></i>Gaming deals, prizes and latest news
</span>
</h3>
<div class="grey-box">
<p>Get the best gaming deals, reviews, product advice, competitions, unmissable gaming news and more!</p>

</footer></div>
</section>
